column7: Open to all UIUC instrumentalists, rappers, vocalists, DJs, emcees, beatboxers, writers, composers, arrangers, dancers, videographers, audio engineers, producers, graffiti artists, and all other students interested in studying and performing hip hop, trip hop, R&B, dubstep, drum & bass, trap, jazz rap, salsa hop, rap metal, chillwave, gospel hip hop, and related genres. 1 undergraduate hour. 1 graduate hour. May be repeated in separate semesters to a maximum of 8 undergraduate hours or 6 graduate hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor.
